articles.description: Follow live text coverage as the PDC World Darts Championship final as Luke Littler faces Michael van Gerwen at Alexandra Palace.
articles.title: World Darts Championship Final 2025 LIVE: Luke Littler vs Michael van Gerwen - time & scores

articles.description: World number six Elena Rybakina's former coach Stefano Vukov is suspended by the WTA as an investigation into his behaviour towards the player continues.
articles.title: Elena Rybakina's ex-coach Stefano Vukov suspended as WTA investigation continues

articles.description: Australia opener Sam Konstas has affected Test opponents India by getting "under their skin", according to team-mate Scott Boland.
articles.title: Australia v India: Sam Konstas 'under India's skin' after fiery finish in Sydney

articles.description: Luke Littler was throwing darts while still in his nappy. On Friday, the teenager could take the final step of a journey that began almost as soon as he could walk.
articles.title: Luke Littler: PDC World Championship final and immortality beckon for teenager

articles.description: Australia dismiss India for 185 on day one of their series decider but a fired-up Jasprit Bumrah strikes with the final ball of the day to boost the tourists late on.
articles.title: Australia v India: Jasprit Bumrah strikes late but hosts on top in Sydney

articles.description: Tottenham have signed Denmark midfielder Olivia Holdt on a contract running until June 2027.
articles.title: Tottenham sign Denmark midfielder Olivia Holdt from FC Rosengard

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he "could not be more excited" as he embarks on his new career at Ferrari in 2025.
articles.title: Formula 1: Lewis Hamilton 'could not be more excited' as Ferrari career starts

articles.description: With Barcelona unable to register summer signing Dani Olmo for the second half of the season, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at the club's current crisis.
articles.title: Dani Olmo: Spain midfielder in limbo as Barcelona left mired in uncertainty

articles.description: Celtic hold talks to re-sign former defender Kieran Tierney on a pre-contract deal from Arsenal.
articles.title: Kieran Tierney: Celtic in pre-contract talks with Arsenal defender

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler speaks to BBC Sport's Natalie Pirks on the eve of his "massive" PDC World Championship final against Michael van Gerwen.
articles.title: Luke Littler ready for 'massive' PDC World Darts Championship final against Michael van Gerwen
